si.title: யாழ். සංවර්ධනය පිළිබඳ සාකච්ඡාව
body_lines: குறிகட்டுவான் இறங்குதுறையினை பெருந்திட்டத்திற்கு அமைய (Master Plan) அபிவிருத்தி செய்வது தொடர்பான கலந்துரையாடல் யாழ்ப்பாண மாவட்ட செயலர் மருதலிங்கம் பிரதீபன் தலைமையில் நேற்று புதன்கிழமை (01) மாவட்ட செயலகத்தில் நடைபெற்றது.
ප්රවාහන මහාමාර්ග හා වරාය අමාත්ය බිමල් රත්නනායක, ධීවර අමාත්ය

මෙම සාකච්ඡාවේදී වේලානායි ප්රදේශ් සභාවේ සභාපති. ශිවකරන් සහ පීඒ. මාර්ග සංවර්ධන අධිකාරියේ අධ්යක්ෂ ක ru ස්, නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරියේ අධ්යක්ෂ සහ නාගරික සංවර්ධන අධිකාරියේ නියෝජ්ය අධ්යක්ෂ, ප්රවාහන මහාමාර්ග අමාත්ය, මාර්ග සංවර්ධන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුවේ අධ්යක්ෂ, වේලානායි ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම්

en.title: Yall. Discussion on Development
body_lines: A discussion on the development of the Master Plan was held at the District Secretariat on Wednesday (01) under the patronage of Jaffna District Secretary Marudalingam Pradeepan.

Transport Highways and Ports Minister Bimal Ratnayake, Fisheries Minister Ramalingam Chandrasekhar, District Secretary Marudalingam Pradeepan and Department Officers Sakitham on August 9 The discussion was a discussion with shareholders.

In this discussion, the Chairman of the Velanai Pradeshiya Sabha. Sivakaran and Pa. Jayakaran, Director of Road Development Authority Cruise, Director of Urban Development Authority and Deputy Director of Urban Development Authority, District Coordinating Committee Coordinator, Coordinator of Transport Highways Minister, Road Development Department Director, Velanai Divisional Secretary
